title: How to Fry Eggs (Extended Process)
introduction: This is a detailed 10-step guide on frying eggs, designed for practice or repetition. The process typically takes 15-20 minutes.

steps.title: Crack Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Carefully crack the eggs into a bowl.
steps.details: Hold an egg firmly but gently. Tap it against a flat surface and open it over a bowl, ensuring no shells fall in.

hotspots.title: Tap Point
hotspots.description: Tap the egg gently here against a flat surface

hotspots.title: Bowl Position
hotspots.description: Position the bowl here to catch the egg contents

tips: Use fresh eggs for the best results
Crack eggs on a flat surface to minimize shell fragments

steps.title: Beat Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Whisk the eggs until well mixed.
steps.details: Use a fork or whisk to beat the eggs in a bowl until the yolks and whites are fully combined. Add a pinch of salt or pepper if desired.
verificationPoints: Egg mixture is smooth and consistent
tips: Whisk briskly for a fluffier texture
Add a splash of milk for creamier eggs, if desired

steps.title: Pour Eggs Into Pan
steps.shortDescription: Transfer the beaten eggs to a preheated pan.
steps.details: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly coat with butter or oil. Pour the beaten eggs into the pan, spreading evenly.
verificationPoints: Egg mixture spreads evenly in the pan
tips: Use low to medium heat to avoid burning
Tilt the pan gently to ensure even coverage

steps.title: Fry Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Cook the eggs to your preferred consistency.
steps.details: Let the eggs cook undisturbed for a minute or two. Use a spatula to gently move them around if scrambling, or flip carefully if frying sunny-side up.
verificationPoints: Eggs reach desired consistency (runny, firm, etc.)
tips: Adjust heat as needed to avoid overcooking
Use a non-stick spatula for easy handling

steps.title: Repeat: Crack Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Repeat the process of cracking eggs into a bowl.
steps.details: Follow the same technique as Step 1 to crack another set of eggs into a bowl, ensuring no shells fall in.
tips: Maintain a steady hand for cleaner cracks
Discard shells immediately to keep the area clean

steps.title: Repeat: Beat Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Whisk the eggs again until well mixed.
steps.details: Just like in Step 2, whisk the eggs until the yolks and whites are fully combined. Add seasoning as desired.
verificationPoints: Egg mixture is smooth and consistent
tips: Use brisk, consistent movements for even mixing
Add a small amount of seasoning for variety

steps.title: Repeat: Pour Eggs Into Pan
steps.shortDescription: Pour the beaten eggs into the preheated pan again.
steps.details: Repeat Step 3 by heating the pan, greasing it lightly, and pouring the beaten eggs evenly.
verificationPoints: Egg mixture spreads evenly in the pan
tips: Check pan heat with a drop of waterâ€”it should sizzle gently
Use a spatula to spread eggs evenly if needed

steps.title: Repeat: Fry Eggs
steps.shortDescription: Cook the eggs to your preferred consistency again.
steps.details: As in Step 4, let the eggs cook undisturbed and use a spatula to adjust as needed.
tips: Monitor the heat carefully to prevent overcooking

steps.title: Repeat: Crack Eggs Again
steps.shortDescription: Repeat cracking eggs one more time.
steps.details: For additional practice, crack eggs into a bowl as in Step 1.
tips: Focus on cracking technique to avoid shells

steps.title: Repeat: Beat Eggs Again
steps.shortDescription: Whisk the eggs one last time.
steps.details: Repeat Step 2, whisking the eggs until well combined and seasoned.
verificationPoints: Egg mixture is smooth and consistent
tips: Keep whisking briskly for smooth consistency

items: Repetition builds confidence and skill in cooking
Experiment with different cooking times for varied textures
Adjust seasoning to explore different flavors

support.troubleshooting: If your eggs stick or burn, reduce the heat and ensure the pan is properly greased.
